trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objetos em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRowCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe DetailsViewRowCollection é usada para armazenar e gerenciar uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objetos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Each row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada linha em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle é representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control uses the DetailsViewRowCollection class for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controle usa a classe DetailsViewRowCollection para sua <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> property contains only the data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>propriedade contém apenas as linhas de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the header row, footer row, top pager row, and bottom pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar a linha de cabeçalho, linha de rodapé, linha superior pager e linha de pager inferior, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.BottomPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.TopPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.FooterRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.HeaderRow%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRowCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object from the collection at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: A classe DetailsViewRowCollection dá suporte a várias maneiras de acessar os itens na coleção:-Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Item%2A>indexador para recuperar diretamente um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objeto da coleção em um índice com base em zero específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para recuperar um enumerador que pode ser usado para iterar pela coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar os itens na coleção em uma matriz, que pode ser usada para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número total de itens na coleção, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> classe usando especificado <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>classe usando especificado <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>objeto contém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objetos com o qual preencher a coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> objects with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objetos com a qual inicializar a coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object to the specified <xref:System.Array> object, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto ao <xref:System.Array>objeto, começando no índice especificado em <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> especificado

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object into the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para copiar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto na matriz especificada, iniciando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The array can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A matriz, em seguida, pode ser usada para acessar os itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você deve usar uma matriz com base em zero para o `array` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array>que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro índice especificado na <xref:System.Array>para receber o conteúdo copiado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Count para determinar o número de itens na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é comumente usada ao fazer a iteração pela coleção para determinar o limite superior.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Count é normalmente usada para determinar se uma coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um enumerador que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para obter um enumerador que pode ser iterado por meio de linearmente para acessar cada item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o item na posição atual do enumerador, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>método para mover para o próximo item na coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para mover o enumerador como sua posição inicial, use o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando você inicialmente obter o enumerador ou usar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>método para mover o enumerador para o primeiro item na coleção, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item é representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>-implementado o objeto que contém todos os <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the rows in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as linhas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto pode ser modificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the IsReadOnly property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade IsReadOnly para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto pode ser modificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object can be modified in all cases.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false`, para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto pode ser modificado em todos os casos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto for sincronizado (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Use the IsSynchronized property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade IsSynchronized para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto é thread-safe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade foi substituída para sempre retornar `false` para indicar que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>o objeto não é thread-safe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> objeto da coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Use este indexador para recuperar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>objeto da coleção no índice especificado, usando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> para recuperar da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the SyncRoot property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade SyncRoot para obter um objeto que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: O objeto retornado nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto propriamente dito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade SyncRoot, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que pode ser usado para sincronizar o acesso à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref> object to the specified <xref:System.Array> object, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array>.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens neste <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref> objeto ao <xref:System.Array>objeto, começando no índice especificado em <xref:System.Array>.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array> especificado

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the ICollection.CopyTo method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> class to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> object into the specified <xref:System.Array> object, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do método CopyTo é um método auxiliar usado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>classe para copiar os itens a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>objeto especificado <xref:System.Array>objeto, iniciando no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> object can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>objeto, em seguida, pode ser usado para acessar os itens na coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array> object for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você deve usar um com base em zero <xref:System.Array>de objeto para o `array` parâmetro.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma base zero <xref:System.Array>que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRowCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro índice especificado na <xref:System.Array>para receber o conteúdo copiado.</xref:System.Array>
